name: Modal
description: Component that present content on top of the invoking screen

props.name: enableModalBlur
props.description: Blurs the modal background when transparent (iOS only)

props.name: blurView
props.description: A custom view to use as a BlueView instead of the default one

props.name: onBackgroundPress
props.description: Allow dismissing a modal when clicking on its background

props.name: overlayBackgroundColor
props.description: The background color of the overlay

props.name: keyboardAvoidingViewProps
props.description: Send additional props to the KeyboardAvoidingView (iOS only)
